events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request for money back on the wrong item delivery.
Assigning the case to the refund specialist team to process the customer's refund request efficiently.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered instead of what I purchased.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. No need to return the item.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. That works perfectly for me, thank you!
The refund process is confirmed and completed on our end. You should receive the amount shortly in your account.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with this resolution.
Closing the case now as the customer confirmed receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction with the support provided.
